# Hanzo CLI

> Command-line tools for the Hanzo AI platform.

## About
Hanzo CLI (hanzo.sh) provides command-line tools for installing, configuring, deploying, and managing AI models and services on the Hanzo AI platform. It supports model deployment, cloud resource management, blockchain node operations, and CI/CD integration from the terminal.

## Key Features
- Install with a single command: `curl -fsSL https://hanzo.sh | sh`
- Deploy and manage AI models from the terminal
- Cloud resource provisioning and management
- Blockchain node and wallet operations
- API key and secrets management
- CI/CD pipeline integration
- Multi-environment configuration (dev, staging, production)
- Shell completions for bash, zsh, and fish
- Plugin system for extending functionality

## Usage
```bash
# Install
curl -fsSL https://hanzo.sh | sh

# Login
hanzo login

# Deploy a model
hanzo deploy --model zen-qwen3-8b

# Manage cloud resources
hanzo cloud list
hanzo cloud create --gpu a100 --count 4

# Blockchain operations
hanzo node start --chain ethereum
```
